document.full_text: refineries operated by bp plc, marathon oil and valero energy corp accounting for a combined 765,000 barrels of oil a day have been disrupted by power outages in texas city, texas, officials said.
document.title: power cuts hit bp, marathon, valero texas plants
lines_and_colors: refineries operated by bp plc, marathon oil and valero energy corp accounting for a combined 765,000 barrels of oil a day have been disrupted by power outages in texas city, texas, officials said.
